asgn1Election

Class Election

  • java.lang.Object
    • asgn1Election.Election
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PrefElection, SimpleElection

    public abstract class Election
extends java.lang.Object

    Abstract class to specify the workings of a seat based election. Election lies at the root of a hierarchy of concrete elections, here SimpleElection and PrefElection, each of which must implement specific versions of the abstract methods findWinner()isFormal(Vote) and clearWinner(int). Note that clearWinner is used only in the context of findWinner, but is nevertheless crucial and specific to the given system

    Some private methods here are used to parse particular parameters from the definition and vote files. These are provided for you as is.

    Author:
    hogan

        public abstract boolean isFormal(Vote v)

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • loadDefs

        public void loadDefs()
              throws ElectionException,
                     java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                     java.io.IOException,
                     NumbersException
        Loads electoral definitions from the file specified by the Election name. This includes name, enrolment, numCandidates and the candidates themselves
        Throws:
        ElectionException - if invalid lines in election files
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if election file not found
        java.io.IOException - from BufferedReader
        NumbersException - if parsing of integers fails

      • loadVotes

        public void loadVotes()
               throws ElectionException,
                      java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                      java.io.IOException,
                      NumbersException
        Loads votes from the file specified by the Election name. Formality is checked according to the election type. Formal votes are recorded in the election vote collection. Informal votes are discarded but counted.
        Throws:
        ElectionException - if invalid lines in vote file
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if vote file not found
        java.io.IOException - from BufferedReader
        NumbersException - if parsing of integers fails
